text: laqad baeathna nwhana 'iilaa qwmh; lydewhm 'iilaa tawhid allah subhanah w'ikhlas alebadt lh, fqal: ya qawm aebuduu allah whdh, lays lakum min 'ilh yastahiqu alebadt ghyrh jl wela fakhlsu lah alebadt fa'iin lam tafealuu wbqytm ealaa eibadat awthankm, f'inny 'akhaf 'an yhll ealaykum eadhab yawm yueazim fih blawkm, wahu yawm alqyamt
